description: Modifies attributes for CloudHSM backup. Cross-account use: No. You cannot perform this operation on an CloudHSM backup in a different Amazon Web Services account.

parameters.name: BackupId
parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of the backup to modify. To find the ID of a backup, use the  DescribeBackups operation.

parameters.name: NeverExpires
parameters.description: Specifies whether the service should exempt a backup from the retention policy for the cluster. True exempts a backup from the retention policy. False means the service applies the backup retention policy defined at the cluster.

nested_items.name: BackupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the backup.

nested_items.name: ClusterId
nested_items.description: The identifier (ID) of the cluster that was backed up.

nested_items.name: CreateTimestamp
nested_items.description: The date and time when the backup was created.

nested_items.name: CopyTimestamp
nested_items.description: The date and time when the backup was copied from a source backup.

nested_items.name: NeverExpires
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the service should exempt a backup from the retention policy for the cluster. True exempts a backup from the retention policy. False means the service applies the backup retention policy defined at the cluster.

nested_items.name: SourceRegion
nested_items.description: The AWS Region that contains the source backup from which the new backup was copied.

nested_items.name: SourceBackup
nested_items.description: The identifier (ID) of the source backup from which the new backup was copied.

nested_items.name: SourceCluster
nested_items.description: The identifier (ID) of the cluster containing the source backup from which the new backup was copied.

nested_items.name: DeleteTimestamp
nested_items.description: The date and time when the backup will be permanently deleted.

nested_items.name: TagList
nested_items.description: The list of tags for the backup.

nested_items.name: HsmType
nested_items.description: The HSM type used to create the backup.

nested_items.name: Mode
nested_items.description: The mode of the cluster that was backed up.
